There are many events and gameplay modes that can be experienced via Co-Op Mode, allowing Travelers to make a lot of new friends along the way.<br>From now till June 29, participate in the topic "Co-Op Mode" and share Co-Op content for a chance to win Primogems!}}
'''"Co-Op Mode" Topic Event''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 3.7]].

==Event Rewards==
Primogem Reward: Primogems ×100 (60 winners)<br>
Post under the topic#Co-Op Mode and share your Co-Op stories to participate in the draw.

==Event Duration==
June 16, 2023 10:00:00 – June 29, 2023 23:59:59 (UTC+8)

==How to Participate==
During the event, you can experience gameplay and events, including Genius Invokation TCG, Divine Ingenuity, and Feast of the Departed Warriors, in Co-Op Mode, or choose to adventure across the land of Teyvat in Co-Op Mode.

Publish your Co-Op Mode content using the topic #Co-Op Mode to participate in the event. There are no limits to the format of your post (images, text, videos, etc.).

==Notes==
# The following situations will be considered invalid participation:
## The content of the post violates Community Rules, or plagiarized, or misappropriated content from other authors.
## Publishing content unrelated to the theme of the event, content that contain any form of advertising, and those which seek to spread malicious rumors or discredit the game and its characters.
# Please go to My Information > Information Management > Game Information Management > Genshin Impact to fill in your Genshin Impact UID.
If winning Travelers have not filled in their UID after the results are announced, they will be deemed to have forfeited their Primogems reward.
